name: Joe
message: I am extremely upset about this service!  Let me speak to a manager, now!

name: Jane
message: We are very sorry to hear this.  Are you sure there is nothing I can help you with?

name: Joe
message: Absolutely not!  This is ridiculous.  I was a refund.

name: Jane
message: We can assist with this.  It would be my pleasure.

name: Felicity
message: Hi Joe.  I would be happy to refund you your money, and give you free service for a year.

name: Joe
message: Well that is better.  I assume I will receive this refund on my next bill?

name: Joe
message: Great!  Now I can use the service for a year at no cost to me.  This is wonderful.  Thank you Felicity!

name: Felicity
message: Sure Joe, I am happy to have helped you today.  Is there anything else?

name: Joe
message: Not at all.  Have a great day!
